A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There were parts of the film that was fun and some really well done scenes\, but the movie as a whole was not good. Just because a movie is 'fun' does not make it good. I believe that a lot of people are simply basing their good reviews on how fun the movie was. I or anyone else for that matter can have fun watching a Transformers movie\, as long as we turn our brains off and just enjoy the ride- and critics hate those films. Star Wars is different\, it has a long standing lore\, it follows rules- and when you break those things and replace them with politics then you are missing the whole point. I respect what director Rian Johnson was trying to do\, he seems like a nice person and has a good track record as far as filmmaking goes. It looks like all the critics are trying to play nice with Disney for some reason...
